title: Zero stars
content: You buy a case for protection but you keep it for its utility. Although the rubber of this case protects your pencil as any other external coating would do, but it fails miserably on the utility part. 1. Difficult to get on. Even more difficult is to get it off of your pencil. 2. No charging support over an iPad case 3. Average quality cutout and looks. 4. You‚Äôll lose the rubber tip sooner than you think. The lose fitting rubber tip is there so that you are not able to return the item and get your money back. That‚Äôs the end of my review. Price should have been Rs. 10/- instead of Rs. 400/-  IMO. Peace.
author: Sam
product: OJOS Silicone Case Compatible Pencil 2nd Generation Holder Sleeve Cover Skin for iPad Pro 11 12.9 inch 2018 with 2 Protective Nib Covers, Black

title: A cover and grip controller.
content: Go for it if you want a better grip holder and control. - excellent workflow while doing illustration - smooth slip on -  two caps - fits and squeezes easily in my ipad cover slot - excellent uneffected magnetic charge

title: Don‚Äôt buy
content: So the picture shows a nice lilac purple and the colour that was delivered was a dark purple not even mauve. The colour makes the pencil so loud and the quality looks cheap. It doesn‚Äôt fit as well as the other cases I have. It‚Äôs a very weird fit with an unusually long cap. There‚Äôs also a self design on the case which gives it a bad texture to hold and use.
author: Jyaysi Kapadia
product: OJOS Silicone Case Compatible Pencil 2nd Generation Holder Sleeve Cover Skin for iPad Pro 11 12.9 inch 2018 with 2 Protective Nib Covers, Black

title: different from the one in picture
content: They showed a cut out in the picture for tap feature but in the product I received there is no cut out and tapping sensitivity is not good. Also the attaching magnetic strength decreases.
author: VishalJose
product: OJOS Silicone Case Compatible Pencil 2nd Generation Holder Sleeve Cover Skin for iPad Pro 11 12.9 inch 2018 with 2 Protective Nib Covers, Black

title: Over priced cheap product
content: Not up to the cost. Over priced. It is a cheap rubber material well packed. Worth of 10 to 20 rupees.
author: Arun kumar J
product: OJOS Silicone Case Compatible Pencil 2nd Generation Holder Sleeve Cover Skin for iPad Pro 11 12.9 inch 2018 with 2 Protective Nib Covers, Black

title: Not a good buy for the price
content: Its works fine and everything, but the main probem is that you cannot charge your pencil with this case on it which is not acceptable for this price.. quality is also very bad ..has good response to the touch but definitely a no for artists as we have charge pencil and for that you have to remove the case which is a bit difficult to do..i got this yesterday, and i have thrown this product yesterday itself as its of no use for me. .
author: Ajith Chandran
product: OJOS Silicone Case Compatible Pencil 2nd Generation Holder Sleeve Cover Skin for iPad Pro 11 12.9 inch 2018 with 2 Protective Nib Covers, Black

title: Not useful
content: The protector is supposed to protect the apple pencil but i feel like my pencil has received more damage due to it. 1. Pencil doesnt charge with the ipad case and pencil case both on 2. It becomes loose as you take it off and put it back on successively which you would need to do to charge the pencil. 3. The caps tend to accumulate dust and particles when kept in a bag/pocket while using the pencil and ultimately scratches the tip and the pencil both. 4. Definitely not worth the price. 5. Most important, doesnt fit in most ipad cases so you need to carry it separately and leads to it being dropped more often.
author: Amazon Customer
product: OJOS Silicone Case Compatible Pencil 2nd Generation Holder Sleeve Cover Skin for iPad Pro 11 12.9 inch 2018 with 2 Protective Nib Covers, Black

content: Grip is superb . Didn‚Äôt charge or connect magnetically with my case . Didn‚Äôt fit in my ipad case which has apple pencil holder . But the cap is very useful and strong . Writing is very productive.
